definitions.definition: A participant in any of a group of sporting activities including track and field , road running , cross country running and racewalking .
A person who actively participates in physical sports, especially with great skill; a sportsperson .
examples: She's the first athlete in her sport to obtain a corporate sponsor.

main_definition: A participant in any of a group of sporting activities including track and field , road running , cross country running and racewalking .
secondary_definitions: ( US , Canada ) A person who actively participates in physical sports, especially with great skill; a sportsperson .
